name: Duck Simulator 3D: Flying Bird Life
description:
Become one of the most beautiful swimming birds in the world – a duck! Live the whole life of this wild birdy flying above the fantastically green meadows, thrive forest and bright lakes’ surface! Make your own nest, find your mate and raise your own family of little ducklings playing Duck Simulator 3D: Flying Bird Life and have fun!
Swim through the perfect blue water, watch beautiful surroundings from above and do everything you want! Search for appetizing fish to quench your hunger! Just hide yourself in the bush near the lake line to catch a fish and you’ll get more energy to fly! Try to find your mate to create your own beautiful family of quack ducks! Lead your swimming duck mate to the nest and protect the eggs from different cruel predators’ attacks!
Be attentive and careful even if this place seems to be safe and calm: cruel fox, aggressive bear and cool-headed frog are always here to attack your ducklings suddenly! Secure support of hares and deer to increase your chances to survive! Don’t forget to mind your health, hunger and energy indicators: if one of them drops, your life and your little family may be really threatened! Avoid dangerous fights and just enjoy Duck Simulator 3D: Flying Bird Life!
Earn points for successfully done missions and power your duck up to become more speedy, enduring and dexterous! Unlock the wide range of colorful skins to look like Mallard drake, Mandarin duck, Muscovy duck, Ringed teal and other really beautiful ones! Try them all and choose your favorite one!
Duck Simulator 3D: Flying Bird Life features:
• Ultimate swimming duck survival simulator
• Various types of interesting surviving quests to complete
• Opportunity to mate and raise a family
• Different enemies to fight with
• Amazing 3D graphics
Become this really nice swimming bird searching for the fish and tasty grass! Explore wild forest and bright meadows to find your mate, raise a family and protect it from your enemies with Duck Simulator 3D: Flying Bird Life!
